titles: At the court at Whitehall, the 29th day of December, 1694 By the Lords of His Majesties most honourable Privy Council.
author: England and Wales. Privy Council.
publisher: printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd; printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,
notes: "For making the necessary alterations in the Prayer Book on the death of Queen Mary. ... Alterations from King and Queen to King, &c., to be made in Morning and Evening Prayers, Litany, ... Alterations to be made with a pen till new editions are printed." -- Steele.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
keywords: Mary --  II, --  Queen of England, 1662-1694 --  Early works to 1800.
William --  III, --  King of England, 1650-1702 --  Early works to 1800.
Church of England. --  Book of common prayer --  Early works to 1800.
